모두모두 꼭 해보세욧

One of my favorite Puzzle games. Valve really did well on it and while some of the puzzles are very frustrating or reaction time heavy, it is fairly fun and enjoyable to come back to, regardless of how outdated the graphics and the storytelling is compared to modern standards. 

The multiplayer section is very fun however it has a glaring issue, due to the fact you simply must have someone to play with to get to enjoy that aspect of the game, since the "Two player maps" are infact impossible to beat alone, unfortunately. While it is great that Portal 2 has maps that work for two players, it is very significant that you cannot have an AI companion or a "switch which character you control" system to allow Singleplayer enjoyment of it.

Also, the community maps and mods are awesome.
이게임은 틀에 박힌 사고방식을 깨고 여러가지 방법을 통해서 스테이지를 해결해 나가는 모험심을 가지고 있는 게임입니다

Highly Recommended still in 2020

Lads and Lasses, I played the first one a few weeks ago before finally finishing this one... and boy oh boy, is the second one good! Usually, when a sequel is made it isn't always guaranteed to be half as good as the first. But this one is as good as the first Portal if not better and has awesome puzzles that you too might get suck on for hours! I only recall 3 or 4 that really left me stumped for that long... hints all the hours I have as of reviewing (12.8). I don't find satisfaction in looking up YT videos on how to get past a level. I'll give you one hint that isn't going to spoil anything and that's if you get stuck leave the game for a bit and come back with fresh eyes! The story to me was really good but does die down at one point but does pick back up and the gameplay is phenomenal!

Settings I ran this at 1440p 60fps with mostly maxed setting and the game looks surprisingly good for its age system specs: Ryzen 3 3200G 16GB of ram on Pop_OS! (Linux).
tiene coop y la historia es simplemente magnifica
11/10. One of the best games I've played

(Polish Language)
Bardzo fajna gierka do pogrania samemu lub z znajomym gdzie musisz pomyśleć aby iść dalej przy czym często się poirytujesz a czasami zwyczajnie się mocno wkurzysz na poziom i po paru godzinach lub dniach będziesz w końcu wiedzieć jak to przejść i z kolejnym poziomem będziesz mieć problem aż w końcu będziesz na końcu i przejdziesz do trybu co-op gdzie oboje będziecie przechodzić te poziomy aż w końcu wy oboje zobaczycie inne zakończenie a potem wam się to znudzi aż sami zrobicie własne poziomy i potem też wam to się znudzi i po paru latach wrócicie do tej gry powspominać dobra i złe chwile i tak w kółko.

길게 말해 뭐해 존잼

[i]"Se a vida te der limões, não faça uma limonada, jogue-os de volta para ela"[/i]
Se alguém te der Portal, jogue e descubra um universo tão cuidadosamente planejado e brilhantemente engenhado, aprecie uma história envolvente e cativante, veja videos sobre a lore, se apaixone cada vez mais e faça uma análise dizendo o quão "Portal" Portal é.

Remember when you tried
to kill me twice?
Oh how we laughed and laughed
Except I wasn't laughing
Under the circumstances
I've been shockingly nice

You want your freedom?
Take it

but
Now I only want you gone

She was a lot like you
(Maybe not quite as heavy)
Now little Caroline is in here too

will never happen to you

short sad
life left

if it weren't so sad

I don't need anyone now
When I delete you maybe
I'll stop feeling so bad

Go make some new disaster

Now I only want you gone
Now I only want you...
gone

Such an amazing game, honestly could play for hours. The first game was good as well along with the odd feeling of emptiness. However this game makes you feel like an explorer at some parts and I love it. One of my favourite things to do is to fling myself, it just feels great. The story is really good, the humor is so good, and the music, OH THE MUSIC! *chef's kiss* This game is truly one of the most amazing games that I have ever played.

ONLY SINGLEPLAYER / ALL SINGLEPLAYER ACHIEVEMENTS

Can't help but love Valve for their games. Marvelous sequel, unbelievable voice acting, intriguing depth, but in the end "just" an ingenious puzzle-game after all.

The fact that there are people who legitimately don't like this game is shocking. This game has creeped into my heart as one of, if not the, best game I've ever played because of it's immensely comedic characters, storyline and difficulty.
